title: Climate Change Hoax - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/2/18
itunes:title: Climate Change Hoax - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/2/18
description:
George Noory and engineer Steve Goreham examine his research into climate change and energy economics, and discuss if belief in man made climate change is built on faulty science.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
